resources.string: Software for managing volume and for reducing electromagnetic waves during phone calls. \nCopyright (C) 2010 - Cristiano Tagliamonte.
Enable or disable whole Sanity sytem. If disabled, Sanity never take actions during phone calls.
Check to disable Sanity system when headsets (wired or wireless) are connected.
Which devices should be disabled for reducing electromagnetic waves during a call.
Disable Mobile Data (2G/3G) during a call (it will be restored at call end).
Disable Wifi during a call (it will be restored at call end).
Disable Bluetooth during a call (it will be restored at call end).
Options for enabling and disabling devices during a call by checking proximity sensor.
Turn OFF devices only when the phone is close to your ear. (If disabled, turn off when call start.)
Delay for turning OFF devices when your ear is close to phone.
Turn ON devices (turned off by Sanity) during a call when the phone is NOT close to your ear.
Delay for turning ON devices when the phone is NOT close to your ear.
Force to turn OFF screen backlight during call when the phone is close to your ear.
Automatically enable/disable handsfree when the phone is far/close to your ear.
Automatically set maximum volume when handsfree is enabled (the volume will automatically restored).
Options for automatic volume setting during a call.
Volume to automatically set during a call while no headsets are used.
Volume to automatically set during a call while using wired headsets.
Volume to automatically set during a call while using wireless headsets.
Choose when Sanity should show notifications.
Notify when devices are automatically turned off by Sanity.
Notify when devices are automatically restored by Sanity.
Notify if Sanity is running when a phone call starts.
Tap here to open the ufficial web site of the GNU General Public License version 3.
Sanity is free. If you like this application, support the development with a donation.
You have supported Sanity. Thank you for your donation!
Unable to open Market for showing author\'s applications! Check the Internet connection is properly working.

Thank you for using Sanity. 

This is the free version, with full capabilities. If you like Sanity, you can donate for supporting it. When donating, this dialog will be suppressed. 

Would you open Market now for donating?

Choose "Cancel" button to refuse it.
